name: World Racing '95 (32-Bit Spring Cleaning Demo)
description:
This is a demo for World Racing '95 Made for the 32-Bit Spring Cleaning game jam. World Racing '95 is in active development with hopes of releasing between May and June 2021. 

Controls: 

  • w/s - Accelerate/Decelerate
  • a/d - Turn Left/Right
  • Left Click - Gear Up
  • Right Click - Gear Down
  • Escape - Quit / To Main Menu

Modes:

  • Arcade: 5 laps against 9 CPU's, standard arcade racing,
  • Story: Take on a variety of Missions as you compete in the World Championships
  • 95 Mode: 5 Laps against 95 CPU's
